Name: Wizard
Equipment: Freeze Spell|Flame Spell|Poison Spell|Thunder Spell|Teleport Spell|Hall of Mirrors
Super Equipment: Flame Spell|Freeze Spell|Hall of Mirrors|Poison Spell|Teleport Spell|Thunder Spell
Last Words 1: Stupendous! Delightful!||I look forward to fighting you many more|times in our eternity together!
Last Words 2: Splendid! Very convincing! You and your friends|are doing excellently[;] really excellently.
Last Words 3: Good show! You and your chums really are making|stellar progress with this fighting lark!
Last Words Endgame: You continue to impress me with your hard work!||My congratulations on your victories[;] against|me and against Lady Luck.

Name: Bounty Hunter
Last Words 1: A crushing defeat - and yet still a thousand times more enjoyable|than anything which happened on X-av-5guu!||Your planet is remarkable!
Last Words 2: Oh well! I'm very used to losing fights. On my home planet|of X-av-5guu I was bullied cruelly for wearing a monocle.||Here on earth[;] everyone is so surprised to|see an alien that they don't even notice.
Last Words 3: Another loss! I mourn it! If I won[;] Lady Luck was going to|let me taste ice cream for the very first time.||It is sweet[;] yet it is cold! Ridiculous! How can that be?
Last Words Endgame: A terrible defeat! And yet I begrudge you nothing[;] because|the Earth food available in our new staff room is a|perpetual wonder to me!||I delight in your very presence!

Name: Drain monster
Equipment: Toxic Sludge|Toxic Sludge|Toxic Sludge|Toxic Sludge|Toxic Sludge|Toxic Sludge|Corrosion
Super Equipment: Strange Ooze|Strange Ooze|Toxic Sludge|Toxic Sludge|Toxic Sludge|Toxic Sludge|Corrosion
Script: End Turn: var cor = getstatus(~corrosion~); var eqlist = []; for(eq in target.equipment){ if(eq.skillcard == ~~){ trace(eq.name + eq.equipmentcol); eqlist.push(eq); } } eqlist=shuffle(eqlist); if(cor>0){ for(i in 0 ... cor){ trace(eqlist[i].name); eqlist[i].availablethisturn=false; } }
Last Words 1: You can act all high and mighty if you like[;] but I live in|the drains. I hear everything. I know EVERYONE's secrets.
Last Words Endgame: Yeah fine[;] but when you're out in the world and hear a|gurgle in the drains[;] you watch out!||It could be me[;] ready to get you when you LEAST EXPECT IT...
